name: turn-based-mcp
description: Turn-based games platform with NextJS frontend and MCP server AI opponent

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build --workspace=web && npm run build --workspace=mcp-server
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=shared && npm run type-check --workspace=web && npm run type-check --workspace=mcp-server
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=shared && npm run clean --workspace=web && npm run clean --workspace=mcp-server
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=shared && npm run test --workspace=web && npm run test --workspace=mcp-server
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --workspace=shared && npm run test:coverage --workspace=web && npm run test:coverage --workspace=mcp-server
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint --workspace=shared && npm run lint --workspace=web && npm run lint --workspace=mcp-server
scripts.ci:tests: npm run test --workspace=@turn-based-mcp/shared && npm run test --workspace=@turn-based-mcp/web && npm run test --workspace=@turn-based-mcp/mcp-server
scripts.ci: npm run build --workspace=@turn-based-mcp/shared && npm run type-check && npm run build --workspace=@turn-based-mcp/web && npm run build --workspace=@turn-based-mcp/mcp-server && npm run ci:tests && npm run lint --workspace=@turn-based-mcp/web
